articles.headline: Warriors' Jimmy Butler ruled out vs. Suns with sore lower back
articles.description: Warriors forward Jimmy Butler, who was dealing with a sore lower back coming into Tuesday's game against the Suns, played just 14 first-half minutes and was ruled out in the third quarter.

images.alt: Warriors' Jimmy Butler ruled out vs. Suns with sore lower back

articles.headline: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic
articles.description: — Zaccharie Risacher scored 21 points, Nickeil Alexander-Walker had 20 and the Atlanta Hawks beat the Orlando Magic 127-112 on Tuesday night.

images.alt: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic

articles.headline: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights

vids.description: Oklahoma City Thunder vs. Indiana Pacers: Game Highlights
vids.headline: Oklahoma City Thunder vs. Indiana Pacers: Game Highlights

vids.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander shines once more for the Thunder, this time putting up a gargantuan 55 points against the Pacers.
vids.headline: SGA wows with career-high 55 as OKC outlasts Indiana in 2OT

track.trackName: COM_NBA Highlight (SGA wows with career-high 55 as OKC outlasts Indiana in 2OT) 2025/10/23 ESHEET

vids.description: Aaron Wiggins knocks down a big-time 3-pointer in double overtime for the Thunder.
vids.headline: 'Bang!' Aaron Wiggins buries a 3 in 2OT for Thunder

track.trackName: NBA_One-Play ('Bang!' Aaron Wiggins buries a 3 in 2OT for Thunder) 2025/10/23 ESHEET
